alert.note: Alert for Pocahontas; Randolph; Webster (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 1:56PM EDT until August 07 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN RANDOLPH...CENTRAL POCAHONTAS AND EAST CENTRAL WEBSTER COUNTIES... At 155 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Snowshoe, or 12 miles west of Cass Scenic Railroad, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cass Scenic Railroad, Greenbank, Snowshoe, Mingo, Monterville, Arbovale, Slaty Fork, and Valley Head. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for northeastern West Virginia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
